definition: forming or capable of forming or molding or fashioning, minimal language unit that has a syntactic (or morphological) function
details:
adjective
- forming or capable of forming or molding or fashioning
= example: forming or capable of forming or molding or fashioning
= synonyms: shaping, plastic
- capable of forming new cells and tissues
= example: capable of forming new cells and tissues
noun
- minimal language unit that has a syntactic (or morphological) function
